document.full_text: a group representing individual video game developers has accused amazon.com inc of setting pricing terms that could harm them in the long run and of trying to win a near monopoly selling games made on android software.
document.title: video game developers group slams amazon pricing
lines_and_colors: a group representing individual video game developers has accused amazon.com inc of setting pricing terms that could harm them in the long run and of trying to win a near monopoly selling games made on android software.
